description: Transform your business data into intelligent AI assistants with Knowlee. Build custom AI teams to automate processes and streamline operations.
title: Knowlee AI - AI Teams Automating Every Business Flow
introduction: Knowlee AI provides AI teams that automate various business processes, allowing work to be completed in less than 10 minutes. The platform offers a free plan with no credit card required and enables users to connect data in minutes.
targetPeople: Businesses and professionals looking to automate their processes and optimize workflows.

faqs.question: What is included in the Free plan?
faqs.answer: The Free plan includes GPT 3.5 Turbo, 1,500,000 chat tokens, up to 100 document uploads, and up to 7 online data sources.

faqs.question: What are the features of the Basic plan?
faqs.answer: The Basic plan includes GPT 3.5/4 Turbo, 2,000,000 chat tokens, up to 500 document uploads, and up to 15 online data sources.

faqs.question: What does the Pro plan offer?
faqs.answer: The Pro plan includes GPT 3.5/4 Turbo, 3,250,000 chat tokens, up to 1,000 document uploads, and up to 30 online data sources.

faqs.question: What is included in the Enterprise+ plan?
faqs.answer: The Enterprise+ plan offers unlimited tokens, full API access, custom integration, and support for Azure, OpenAI, and self-hosted models.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free trial available with no credit card required.
